text:
You liked that movie, didn't you?
(A) I'm moving next month. 
(B) She's an actress.
(C) No, I really didn't.

Why isn't Abigail volunteering for the music festival this year?
(A) Late summer.
(B) Because she'll be out of town. 
(C) Yes, they're building a new music center.

Didn't we buy more blue fabric dye?
(A) Yes, it's in the storeroom.
(B) Would you like a bag for your purchase? 
(C) Any day of the week is fine.

Can you edit the script for the television commercial?
(A) A new digital camera. 
(B) OK do you have a copy?
(C) She's a famous performer.

What's the name of the coffee shop on Oak Street?
(A) Thanks, but I already have some.
(B) His name is Mike Simmons. 
(C) I'm not sure-I don't know that area.

When is the digital marketing conference?
(A) It's Thursday afternoon.
(B) Yes, I plan on going.
(C) A social media Web site.

How can we increase our customer approval rating? ?
(A) His application's been approved. 
(B) Yes, the current rates.
(C) We can offer a discount to returning clients.

Is this jacket made of leather?
(A) No, but this one over here is.
(B) Sure, if my manager agrees.
(C) You should wear a jacket.

When will you hire a new head chef?
(A) An excellent benefits package.
(B) interviewed several candidates Loday... 
(C) No. but can bake bread.

Who's installing the software on our computers?
(A) Some accounting software.
(B) There was an e-mail about that. 
(C) It was an extra monitor.

Where is the keynote speaker staying?
(A) Let me test the microphone. 
(B) Something about medical research
(C) At the Linden Hotel.

We really need to find an experienced plumber.
(A) Do you remember where you left the key? 
(B) I'd like more coffee, thanks.
(C) You're right I know one we can call

Are you free to discuss our project today or tomorrow?
(A) Very recently.
(B) It's an interesting project. 
(C) I can discuss it today.

The same error message keeps appearing on my screen
(A) From the electronics store.
(B) That's a common problem today.
(C) They're on the back table.

When did you start working in the research department?
(A) Only a few weeks ago
(B) Three new projects 
(C) In Building C.

Didn't Olaf order more office supplies?
(A) Check the supply cabinet. 
(B) The meeting is in room 228.
(C) Please tum the water off.

Where can I find Ms. Robbins this afternoon?
(A) It lasted for three hours. 
(B) I have to disagree.
(C) Do you have her phone number?

Would you like some help training the new interns?
(A) Yes, that would be great.
(B) The next train arrives at four o'clock.
(C) Several new employees.

I'm pleased so many employees are coming to the budgeting seminar.
(A) Right-many people signed up
(B) The bank on the corner.
(C) Pleased to meet you.

How was your business trip to Prague?
(A) We signed two new client contracts
(B) I can't leave right now. 
(C) They took a direct flight.

Would you like to go shopping in the afternoon or the evening?
(A) A new line of shoes.
(B) I work the evening shift.
(C) I haven't met her yet.

Where should we go out for lunch today? brought from home.
(A) Oh, I bought food from home.
(B) I'm not familiar with that restaurant. 
(C) No, he ordered some last week.

Why are these concert tickets so expensive?
(A) The form on the left. 
(B) They're in the front row.
(C) see the coatroom.

Can I take some vacation days next week?
(A) We have a lot of work this month. 
(B) You can borrow my phone.
(C) A great travel deal.

Did the furniture shipment go out this moming?
(A) A one-week sale.
(B) It looks nice in this room.
(C) Shipments are always in the afternoon.
